channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
Whenever I try to run a client for peoples server I get this:
[code]'JAVA' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
How should I go about fixing this? bear in mind im using a Windows Vista computer if that makes any difference.

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

I actually put ’ java ’ into the folder on my old PC and it worked.

My Computer -> C: -> Program Files -> Java -> Select a random JRE -> Java

  • move the last java into the client folder *

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @Ibehustlin247 Ibehustlin247
item.description:
@Ibehustlin247 wrote:

I believe you misunderstood me, what I mean is I cant use the run on a client for another persons server, there is no compiler that im supposed to use with the client, also ive installed JDK several times hoping I messed up one of the times… still nothing though.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @bonza bonza
item.description:
@bonza wrote:

u need a better compiler / run.server OR!!
u need
jdk
if u have jdk right click compile.bat and click edit
the put this in it.

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

and now right click/ edit
runserver.bat

and fill it with

@echo off
COLOR 09
title slay scape
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server


your welcome
if it dosnt work add me on msn
slay_scape@hotmail.com

Read full topic
